title: Virtual Reality-Based Language Leadership Simulation: Applying Constructivist Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theory and demonstrated leadership experience
context.additional_context: Multinational team leadership scenario execution in immersive environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners will apply language-based communication strategies considering cultural differences in VR environments with 80% accuracy.
Learners will achieve at least 15 weekly interactions among peers in collaborative tasks based on constructivist teaching methods.
Learners will develop language leadership strategies that meet project-based assessment criteria in a digital simulation environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
